Posts.Content: Helenamead1 wrote: I feel lost. I had bc 13 years ago. Mastectomy reconstruction and tamoxifen. I was 38. My mum has had it twice but we don't have the brca gene Just diagnosed in other breast and lymph nodes already involved. They say chemo then surgery again. I am terrified Am usually so matter of fact. Not sure how I managed lst time. My kids are grown up now and. Doing ok. I had such hope last time. Can anyon one hel Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: New primary Helenamead1 bcisnofun
